document_data.mainbody:
ebopbe was a myconid and leader of the Circle of Growers in Neverlight Grove in the late 15 century DR.
Hebopbe had no interest in the feud between sovereigns Basidia and Phylo. It did not like Phylos innovations but thought that Basidia had exaggerated the danger. It also the myconid communitys mass meldings.
When, circa 1486 DR, Zuggtmoys will twisted most of the Circle, Hebopbe was infected by the spores but had resisted her evil influence.
